attributes.action: Give all NHS workers a bonus. As a reward for working through Covid 19
attributes.additional_details: The government should reward NHS workers with a bonus post Covid 19. The government is paying 80% of lots of people’s wages. The least they can do is reward these brave workers with a bonus.
attributes.background: The government should reward NHS workers with a bonus post Covid 19. The government is paying 80% of lots of people’s wages. The least they can do is reward these brave workers with a bonus.

rejection.details:
ou may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303306

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
